description: The Avro Vulcan F.3A is a long-range intercepter. This variant is equipped with AIM-54 Phoenix missiles and the AWG-9 radar from the F-14A.
notes: Only the pilot and copilot have ejection seats. The other crew members can bail out three game turns after declaring their intent to do so.
loadnotes: Stations 1 to 3 and 5 to 7 are underwing stations. Each may carry two AIM-54A AHMs.
Station 4 is the internal bomb bay. It may carry two auxiliary fuel tanks.
An auxiliary fuel tank has a weight of 14000, 14 load points, and 700 fuel points.
As an exception to the normal rules for load points, internal loads contribute 1 load point for each 1,000 of weight and internal fuel contributes 1 load point for each 50 fuel points.
